Parameters: A @B_com#google#android#gms#common#ConnectionResult_E@ that can be used for resolving the error, and deciding what sort of error occurred. To resolve the error, the resolution must be started from an activity with a non-negative requestCode passed to @B_com#google#android#gms#common#ConnectionResult#startResolutionForResult_E@. Applications should implement onActivityResult in their Activity to call @B_com#google#android#gms#common#GooglePlayServicesClient#connect_E@ again if the user has resolved the issue (resultCode is @B_android#app#Activity#RESULT_OK_E@).
onConnectionFailed(com.google.android.gm.Description: Called when there was an error connecting the client to the service.

ClassDesc: replaced with @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#OnConnectionFailedListener_E@ Provides callbacks for scenarios that result in a failed attempt to connect the client to the service. See @B_com#google#android#gms#common#ConnectionResult_E@ for a list of error codes and suggestions for resolution.
